short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome plugin that changes the wallpaper using Bing API and shows news feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing experience with our all-in-one browser extension! Featuring stunning wallpapers from Bing, your browser transforms into a visual masterpiece every time you open a new tab. If Bing is unavailable, no worries—our plugin seamlessly switches to a carefully curated local library of breathtaking images.

Start your day on a personal note with a friendly greeting that uses your name—the one you provide! Stay updated with real-time weather information and stay organized with an integrated task list that keeps track of your to-dos right from your browser.

For power users, the plugin provides easy access to bookmarks, giving you faster navigation. And for those who love staying connected, enjoy quick links to social media sites and the option to add custom RSS feeds for personalized news updates.

Whether you're seeking inspiration through daily wallpapers, managing your day, or catching up on the latest news, this plugin does it all with style and simplicity.
